article.title: Climate change is going to be even worse than previously predicted, scientists warn

article.title: Pruitt Questions EPA Finding That Climate Change Is Health Risk
article.description: The Obama administration rushed an analysis that found climate change is a risk to human health and welfare, Environmental Protection Agency Administrator Scott Pruitt said, offering a justification that he could use to reverse that determination.

article.title: SpaceX boss Elon Musk to launch his electric car into orbit around Mars
article.description: Elon Musk is to launch his own electric car into orbit around Mars, playing David Bowie's Space Oddity. The SpaceX chief executive said when the company's Falcon Heavy rocket launches in January, the "payload will be my midnight cherry Tesla Roadster".

article.title: Boeing CEO: We're Going to Beat Elon Musk to Mars

article.title: Elon Musk Just Challenged Boeing's CEO on a Major Mars Bet
article.description: The revolution will not be televised. It'll be sent to your inbox by us. Here’s what happened: On Thursday morning, CNBC host Jim Cramer asked Boeing CEO Dennis Muilenburg about which company he thinks will get a human to Mars first, his or Musk’s.

article.title: Boeing’s Dennis Muilenburg says he’ll beat SpaceX to Mars; Elon Musk says ‘Do it’
article.description: So what does SpaceX CEO Elon Musk think of Boeing CEO Dennis Muilenburg’s claim that the first people to set foot on Mars will arrive on a Boeing rocket? “Do it,” Musk tweeted, in one of many two-word comebacks that might have come to mind.
